comment: maybe it cant work now but wait a few decades and we'll see what happens after UBI implementation. and anyway, the anarcho part means no state and so you're free to not appreciate in our communist region if you don't want to. just move elsewhere. shit will be produced using robots not human labour.

comment: Hey there, derogatory comments are not productive. Please refrain from using them and consider other peoples feelings when posting. Thanks
